sentences.en: For me to think I'm any better than a homeless person on the street is ridiculous.
sentences.cn: 在我看来，认为我自己比街上的无家可归者要更加高尚是很可笑的。

sentences.en: For the homeless, private medical care is simply out of the question.
sentences.cn: 对于无家可归的人而言，私人医疗纯粹是天方夜谭。

sentences.en: Hats off to them for supporting the homeless.
sentences.cn: 向他们帮扶无家可归者的善举致敬！

sentences.en: He's not exactly homeless, he just hangs out in this park.
sentences.cn: 确切来说他并不算是无家可归，他只是老在这个公园里转悠。

sentences.en: Hundreds have been killed in the fighting and thousands made homeless.
sentences.cn: 很多人在战火中丧生，更多的人则落得无家可归。

sentences.en: In the worst-case scenario, you could become a homeless person.
sentences.cn: 最坏的情况是你可能会无家可归。

sentences.en: My sister always takes pity on the homeless children.
sentences.cn: 我妹妹一向可怜那些无家可归的孩子.

sentences.en: The company put on a play about the homeless.
sentences.cn: 这家剧团上演了一出讲述无家可归者的戏。
无家可归者的艰难困苦

sentences.en: There are those, you know, who, by circumstance, end up homeless.
sentences.cn: 您知道，会有那么一些人，因为命运捉弄而落得无家可归。

sentences.en: They send relief to those who made homeless by floods.
sentences.cn: 他们给水灾中无家可归的人发送救援物资.

sentences.en: They'd soon be penniless and homeless if she couldn't find suitable work.
sentences.cn: 她要找不到合适的工作，他们很快就会身无分文，无家可归。

sentences.en: Thousands of people have been made homeless .
sentences.cn: 成千上万人被逼得无家可归。

sentences.en: Today we're going to focus on the question of homeless people.
sentences.cn: 今天,我们主要讨论无家可归者的问题.
